info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 6 at 6:30AM EDT until April 8 at 3:12AM EDT by NWS Northern Indiana
info.description:
...The National Weather Service in Northern Indiana has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Ohio...
Auglaize River near Fort Jennings affecting Paulding, Allen OH and Putnam Counties.
For the Auglaize River...including Fort Jennings, Defiance...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Auglaize River near Fort Jennings.
* WHEN...From this morning to early Tuesday morning.
* IMPACTS...At 13.0 feet, Minor flooding begins in the northwest Ohio counties of northwest Allen, northeast Van Wert, and southwest Putnam. Farm land nearest the Auglaize river will be affected by flood water.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:15 AM EDT Sunday the stage was 12.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this morning to a crest of 13.3 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage late tonight. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Detailed river forecasts and additional information can be found at www.weather.gov/iwx under Rivers and Lakes.
The next statement will be issued this afternoon.late tonight at 1230 AM EDT.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO EARLY TUESDAY MORNING

area.areaDesc: Allen, OH; Paulding, OH; Putnam, OH
